content:
In this dataset, people are asked whether they believe a tweet contains hatespeech or not. 0 means no hatespeech, and 1 means that there is hatespeech.

Examples from the dataset (there may not be any):Examples from the dataset (there may not be any)
Example 1:
Text: Morning peeps, another day of house hunting to do today, what will the government and media get up to while I'm out and about?    Who can tell.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 2:
Text: Twice in the last century, the New World was forced to come to the aid of the Old. The next European war that will inflame the world is already underway, because like before, Europeans are making decisions that lead inevitably to their own conquest. They never learn. https://tinyurl.com/yae4fkl3
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 3:
Text: Hahah. #Bromance http://attitude.co.uk/new-study-finds-straight-men...
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 4:
Text: @lachlanandrewhall HIHUNNY!!!!!! ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 5:
Text: Sure. No one (in the liberal bubble town) noticed.   https://www.msn.com/en-us/news/other/twitter-claim...
Annotation from annotator: 1

Example 6:
Text: Got to figure out how to add links without having an android exception pop up
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 7:
Text: For my friends who carry (and those who don't) please build one of these for your house and car. Adult/Child CPR kit not shown as I keep it in the glove box, not behind the seat. This one was about $50. House one about $80. You could save a life, maybe your own.#gunsofGab #gun #gun#SaveALife
Annotation from annotator: 0

Text: Exceptional American authors leads 30 figures in the publishing world to call to revoke American authors from being able to apply for this award. It's not a #meritocracy. #amwriting #writerslife #discrimination https://www.theguardian.com/books/2018/feb/02/publ...

Example 13:
Text: Why is it so difficult for folks to understand the meaning of 'here'? 🤔 Meanwhile liberals are losing their minds believing that President Trump's attorneys said that the president is above the law 🙄. Liberals waste so much  time screaming about their misinterpretation of things & ricocheting off each other's lunacy that it's like watching an arcade game
Annotation from annotator: 1

Text: 1 Bitcoin was worth around $0.08 in 2010. Today 1 Bitcoin is worth around $2749.18. I feel sorry for that guy who spent 10,000 Bitcoins on pizza.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 23:
Text: Microsoft buys Github for 7.5 billion dollars and people start moving to Gitlab. Hate to break it to you, but Github was terrible before Microsoft wanted to buy it. They censor, they push social justice code of conducts and centralizing all source code is absurdly dangerous. Gitlab, just FYI, also censors and is also centralized. Not a good alternative.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 29:
Text: What I've come to realize over the years (and I'm not young) is that there are very few people with new ideas, and even fewer who can articulate those ideas effectively. 99% of what we see and hear is regurgitated pablum. Doesn't interest me at all.
Annotation from annotator: 0

Example 30:
Text: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot? All messages get deleted after 24 hours! Even if you haven't read them. Gab, do you know how much space a message takes up? Almost zip. So, don't message someone, just post to them so it doesn't get deleted. Who is the moron who came up with this nonsense?
Annotation from annotator: 0

Target Example:
Text: most disgusting people: - third worlders - gays - illegals - anime/marvel fans - kid fuckers
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer and nothing else.
